act.title: Listen carefully
act.intro: Listen to the sentences below and decide what is being said.

item.quest: How many stops are there to go?
What does the bus conductor say?
item.op: The passenger should stay on the bus for a few more stops.
The passenger has taken the wrong bus.
The passenger has missed the right stop.

item.quest: What does the passenger ask for?
item.op: to be told the right stop
